alert.note: Alert for Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 4:59PM CST until December 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Simpson County in central Mississippi... Smith County in central Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 459 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Magee, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mize around 505 PM CST. Raleigh and Center Ridge around 510 PM CST. Sylvarena around 520 PM CST. Pineville around 530 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central and east central Mississippi.
